author: beforeitsnews.com
title: When The Hilliary Thread Is Pulled ON The Giant Burlap Bag Of Corruption IT Will Come Unraveled | Politics
text:
(Before It's News)
The Investigation on Hilliary Clinton is getting more intense as time goes on. Information about the investigation is being leaked out a little at a time. When One goes back to Libya and then start connecting the dots that we have been given by the MSM One can see that there has to be a out of control fire going on and not just smoke. When it comes to Hilliary Clinton being put in a real hot seat to answer questions or going up the river to the big house: I believe she will give up everything and everyone that is in “the Giant Burlap Bag Of Corruption” in order to safe her own skin. She will talk and talk until she is blue in the face. Now this is of course my prophecy belief and mine alone so I could be wrong and she may take one for the Progressive team. Now it appears that Hilliary Clinton working with George Soros created a “Shadow State Department” which operated outside of the State Department and Congress and The U.S. Senate. This is being reported by ” Alex Jones” on “Info Wars” on Oct 8, 2015 https://youtu.be/BbsQqc0fC8Q George Soros has been trying to bring about the NWO for some time along with Kissinger and many others. The person Alex Jones interviewed states the powers that be are trying to cause an emergency in order to activate FEMA. There is a lot of info in the report. I have to confess that I normally do not listen. This one may be worth your time. Please Remember “Do Not Turn On Each Other” Special Note: The White Hats/Good Guys are Making Moves also for the Good.
